LanguageData.AIRobot_RechargeStation_Hauler.label: Hauler Base Station
LanguageData.AIRobot_RechargeStation_Hauler.descripti: This station comes equipped with a specialized robot.
LanguageData.AIRobot_RechargeStation_Cleaner.label: Cleaner Base Station
LanguageData.AIRobot_RechargeStation_Cleaner.descript: This station comes equipped with a specialized robot.
LanguageData.AIRobot_MinifiedRechargeStation.label: Base Station
LanguageData.AIRobot_Hauler.description: This is a hauling robot. It carries your purchases home and even lifts your new piano up into your room on the 20th floor.
LanguageData.AIRobot_Cleaner.description: A cleaning robot. Cleans your room while you're away. CAUTION: Don't let your pets come near it!
LanguageData.AIRobot_Hauler_disabled.label: HaulingBot (disabled)
LanguageData.AIRobot_Hauler_disabled.description: This is the sad end of a bot. It's no longer useful and needs heavy repairs or dismantling.
LanguageData.AIRobot_Cleaner_disabled.label: CleaningBot (disabled)
LanguageData.AIRobot_Cleaner_disabled.description: This is the sad end of a bot. It's no longer useful and needs heavy repairs or dismantling.
